name: slack-off
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.
flavor_text.emerald: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The user slacks off and restores its HP by half its full HP.
